name: Travel App Freebie

What will happen if a travel app gives you a custom itinerary for your next destination and you just have to purchase it once and enjoy the ride. All the hotel, food, commute, tickets will be included and you can customize the items according to your budget. It's like having a virtual guide on the go ðŸ˜Ž


From this concept, I came up with this travel app UI. Feel free to download the file and share your feedback.
